SELECT b.* from( select a.*, row_number() over(order by a.dclr_no desc) rnum from( select d.dclr_no, d.dclr_sub_id, m2.mem_name dclr_sub_name, m2.mem_prflimg dclr_sub_prflimg, m2.mem_no dclr_sub_no, COUNT(d2.dclr_no) dclr_nmtm, d.dclr_warn_nmtm, TO_CHAR(d.dclr_rcpt_ymd, 'YYYY.MM.DD') dclr_rcpt_ymd, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT dclr_sub_id) FROM declaration) total_dclr FROM declaration d LEFT OUTER JOIN member m1 ON d.dclr_id = m1.mem_no LEFT OUTER JOIN member m2 ON d.dclr_sub_id = m2.mem_no LEFT OUTER JOIN declaration d2 ON d2.dclr_sub_id = d.dclr_sub_id WHERE d.dclr_no = ( SELECT MAX(d3.dclr_no) FROM declaration d3 WHERE d3.dclr_sub_id = d.dclr_sub_id )
AND m2.mem_shtot = 1
GROUP BY d.dclr_no, d.dclr_sub_id, m2.mem_name, m2.mem_prflimg, m2.mem_no, m2.mem_shtot, d.dclr_warn_nmtm, TO_CHAR(d.dclr_rcpt_ymd, 'YYYY.MM.DD') ORDER BY dclr_rcpt_ymd DESC )a )b
where b.rnum >= #{startRow} and b.rnum <= #{endRow}

GROUP BY d.dclr_no, d.dclr_sub_id, m2.mem_name, m2.mem_prflimg, m2.mem_no, m2.mem_shtot, d.dclr_warn_nmtm, d.dclr_state, TO_CHAR(d.dclr_rcpt_ymd, 'YYYY.MM.DD') ) a ) b
